mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_meta (article_id, original_name, saved_name, path, size, content_type, created_at) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{originalName}, #{savedName}, #{path}, #{size}, #{contentType}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT file_id AS fileId, original_name AS originalName, saved_name AS savedName, path, size, content_type AS contentType, created_at AS createdAt FROM file_meta WHERE file_id = #{fileId}
